thread.title: The unreal ASE exporter is showwing a error...

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
I got my model UV mapped, trianglelated but I get this error on the unreal exporter...

http://tinypic.com/3zqzkgk.png

Sorry for the image to be alital over size but I want the image to be %100 readable.

Can someone help me out?

Thank you, Ajm113

post.author: kat
post.body: Open that into 2.41 and retry to export, or failing that try using Goofo's script which you can get from my place. It might just be a compatability problem with 2.42 and the old USM script.

post.author: ajm113
post.body: I tried that and the script kept coming up as saying its a importer.. Isn't there another exporter that does ASE exports?

post.author: kat
post.body: Yes read my post above again... Goofos scripts can be found on my website.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
Thats what im saying! I tried the Goofos ASE script its not working correctly. It keep coming up as a ase importer.

http://www.quake3bits.com/htm/tutorials ... errain.htm

I have been viewing your tutorial but it seems not to work the way as it shows...

post.author: kat
post.body: *exactly* what are you doing? What exporter, what Blender version (and what Python if you have that installed) etc... details.

post.author: ajm113
post.body:
Blender ver 2.42

Python Up to date with newist files

I used the Unreal and the Goofos ASE exporter and the unreal export as shown on the image on the first post. You can look on the error right there on the image.

I am trying to export a tommy gun as a .ase but no luck with that with any plugins or scripts...

Thats all I can tell you.

post.author: Goofos
post.body: Is there a error message in the console window if you export it with my script? Or are you sure you have the export script and not the import script?

post.author: ajm113
post.body: Im pretty sure I do have the export. There is no error. I will have to check again this weekend becuase I have another blender at my other house with all the files I want to use for Doom3. I mite have taken your importer insted. I was sick that weekend so I was not really up and %100 on it. My crapy computer at the house I have right now is lucky enoufe to even be able to run blender.

post.author: motorsep
post.body:
Indeed, Unreal ASE exporter fails to export mesh in CVS Blender. But there is nothing wrong with script. They changed Python API again :/
What you need to do is to add vertex color to your mesh in Blender and then everything is gonna be good

post.author: motorsep
post.body:
Indeed, Unreal ASE exporter fails to export mesh in CVS Blender. But there is nothing wrong with script. They changed Python API again :/
What you need to do is to add vertex color to your mesh in Blender and then everything is gonna be good
